page.title: 18Health Care In Our Area
page.content: If we are ill we go to the{doctor. Everyone has a family{doctor.}All people who work,pay{National Insurance so everyone can have free treatment. Adults pay for medicine but children and O.A.P's do not.People go to the {Opticians}for{glasses}.There are free glasses but most people have fashion- able frames and they pay for these {(average cost Â£50)}I go to the school {dentist}at{Redruth.}Treatment for children is free.If you have an accident you would be taken to the {City Hospital}in{Truro.Tehidy hospital has no accident department but can hold up to{80 patients}at the same time.They do not operate on patients any longer.There is at 60 least staff working at the{hospital.}People come to{Tehidy}to get better from operations.
